name: Ripen
description: The Pokemon can Riped fruits and berries in no time to make them extra sweet and delicious, healing berries will have their effects boosted.
effect:
Berries this Pokemon have an additional effect based on the Rarity.
- Common: Heal 1 HP
- Uncommon: Randomly Increase 1 Stat.
- Rare: Reduce Damage from the next attack that hits the User by 2.
- Very Rare: Heal the User 2 HP and 2 Wounds.
